name: Sqaranch!
description:
Howdy partner! it's time to herd them wacky squares back into their pens so that you can make some money! Guide them alone or with a friend and make as much money as you can! Be careful, if you don't match the colors correctly your squares may get hurt!

Team
  • Del Nordlund
  • Patrick Flattery
  • Sebastian Scaini
